title: Have there been at least 1.1 million deaths by weapon in the United States since the murder of John Lennon?
subtitle: More than 1.1 million firearms-related deaths have occurred in the United States since the murder of John Lennon on 8 December 1980.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: There have been more than 1.1 million firearms-related deaths in the United States since the murder of John Lennon on 8 December 1980.
